response.overview: A homicide detective teams up with an evolutionary biologist to hunt a giant creature that is killing people in a Chicago museum.
response.tagline: They did the unthinkable. They brought it back.
response.title: The Relic

titles.title: เดอะ เรลิค นรกเดินดิน

results.name: The Relic Movie Trailer 1997 - (Penelope Ann Miller, Tom Sizemore, Linda Hunt)
